metadata.name: Ghost of Venice #1
metadata.description:
Apparition – a ghost or ghost-like image of a person. According to the Catholic Church apparitions are instances of private revelation. Each case is different and unique.

“Ghost of Venice” is a collection of seven apparitions. Each GIF starts with the same sequence, but also posses individual traits, which may include changes in tone and additional images in the sequence. Final version of each edition is revealed by the artist within 48 hours after it is collected.

Note: Due to the technical nature of some NFT marketplaces a manual token refresh request may be required to update the GIF file.

LIMITED EDITION 

2000px by 3000px GIF

Image/Artwork artist/creator: Woszczyna&Wiesnowski

Extended Editorial License: Can be used to display privately, or in public, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights for commercial use and/or to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works, under any circumstances.
